LanguageData.GR_HugeBearRug.label: огромный медвежий ковер
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearRug.description: A bear pelt rug. Taxidermy seems to be in vogue on the Rim!

LanguageData.GR_HugeBearRug_Frame.description: A bear pelt rug. Taxidermy seems to be in vogue on the Rim!
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearCatRug.label: огромный медвекотовый ковер
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearCatRug.description: A bearcat pelt rug. This thing seems to be quite more exotic than other pelt rugs!

LanguageData.GR_HugeBearCatRug_Frame.description: A bearcat pelt rug. This thing seems to be quite more exotic than other pelt rugs!

LanguageData.GR_BoarTuskStatuette.label: статуэтка из бивня кабана

LanguageData.GR_LabShelf.label: лабораторная полка
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous laboratory items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf_Blueprint.label: lab shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf_Blueprint_Install.label: lab shelf (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf_Frame.label: lab shelf (building)
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf_Frame.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous laboratory items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat.label: питательный бак
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat.description: A slurry of liquefied organic pulp fills this reinforced glass vat. This solution is used by genetic experiments, and increases work speed when placed near a Genetic Rim machine. One workbench can use to up to two nutrient vats.
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat_Blueprint.label: nutrient vat (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat_Blueprint_Install.label: nutrient vat (blueprint)
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat_Frame.label: nutrient vat (building)
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat_Frame.description: A slurry of liquefied organic pulp fills this reinforced glass vat. This solution is used by genetic experiments, and increases work speed when placed near a Genetic Rim machine. One workbench can use to up to two nutrient vats.
